about_heading_main: ðŸŒ¿ Elixan Aromatica: Nature and Swiss precision
about_intro: Elixan was founded in the heart of Switzerland - with the aim of combining the purity of nature with the precision of Swiss manufacturing. What started as a small project with a simple mission grew into a trusted company producing high quality essential oils and natural flavors.
about_heading_purity: Purity and quality since day one
about_purity_text: Our fundamentals were clear from the start: real, unadulterated essential oils, free of synthetic additives and with complete transparency from source to bottle.
about_quality_text: Every Elixan product is developed and processed according to strict Swiss standards to guarantee the highest purity, safety and effectiveness.
about_sourcing_text: We work with producers from different countries who use environmentally friendly methods and maintain fair working conditions. Sustainability is a central part of our identity.
about_innovation_text: In addition to classic essences, we develop modern scent profiles, new extraction methods and solutions for the aromatherapy, cosmetics and pharmaceutical industries.
about_list_item2: Aromatic solutions for perfumery and cosmetics

about_quality_text_short: We guarantee the purity and effectiveness of our products.
about_experience_text: With over 20 years of experience in aromatherapy.
about_certification_text: Our products meet strict GMP standards.
about_market_text: Elixan is represented in over 50 countries worldwide.
about_services_text: We offer tailor-made solutions for your needs.
about_identity_full:
Elixan carries an essence that goes far beyond products: it is a family history characterized by dedication, Swiss precision and deep respect for nature. For two generations, the company has combined tradition and science to create essential oils and aroma pharmaceutical solutions that stand for authenticity, trust and the highest quality.

Every scent, every formulation and every detail is created in-house at Elixan. Marketing, development, technology and production work hand in hand, ensuring complete quality control. This means that every product that leaves the company can reflect the brand's values: purity, responsibility and innovation.

For Elixan, identity is not just what you make, but how you make it. It is the commitment to high-quality raw materials from the best regions of origin, to fair and long-term trading relationships and to striving for the highest standards in the industry. Elixan appeals to people who value natural, safe and truly effective products.

This is Elixan's identity: a Swiss legacy that combines science, nature and humanity to bring real quality to the world.
